page.title: 19CLUBS(1)
page.content: Campden has many clubs and societies both social and sporting. The Football Club fields two teams on Saturdays,the home team playing on the Recreation Ground. They have built themselves a clubhouse recently. The Cricket Club have built up some of the best facilities in the Cotswolds. They field two teams for league games on Saturdays and two for friendly games on Sundays. They are also forming a good under 16 team. The ladies of Campden have a Hockey team who play on the cricket ground and share their facilities. In the Recreation Ground are the hard courts of the Tennis Club. The Bowls Club has attracted quite a number of younger members and they play their games on a green at the rear of the Noel Arms.
